title: Back to Back Stemplots: Big Brain Test
question_text: Students at East Texas High School take the Big Brains Test during senior year. While classroom X is a typical classroom, classroom Y has an unusual student named Albert. Which of the following statements is true? Stem Classroom X (1) (10) Classroom Y (1) 72 4 - 8766 5 78 854221 6 000001122233555677777889 95431110 7 112 98755110 8 - 95310 9 - - 10 - - 11 - - 12 - - 13 1 Key: 4|7 = 47.

choices.text: Class Y has a greater standard deviation.
Class Y has a greater range.
Class Y has a greater variance.
Class Y has a greater median.
Class Y has a greater mean.
